scripts.start: npm run dynamodb-generate-seed-data && serverless dynamodb install && serverless offline start
scripts.localstack-statedeploy: awslocal s3 cp state-machine/workflows/gameplay_definition.json s3://`awslocal s3 ls | grep \\\"kendev\\\" | cut -d ' '  -f3`/
scripts.localstack-update: npm run localstack-statedeploy && awslocal cloudformation deploy --template-file ./cloudformation.yaml --stack-name kendev --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
